CLICK ON ONE OF THE BUTTONS (CUBE OR SPHERE) ON THE LEFT TO CREATE GEOMETRIES. PRESS THE X TO RESET THE SCENE. TO CHANGE THE CAMERA ANGLE CLICK AND DRAG WITH YOUR MOUSE IN THE CENTER AREA OF THE SCREEN. TO ZOOM USE SCROLL.
